Translations.Text: Tvoj Lord bol 1 GOD created heavens zem 6 dni potom assumed all authority night overtakes dni it pursues it persistently sun moon stars committed serve Jeho command Absolutely He controls all creation all commands Exalted bol GOD Lord universe
Ona kult tvoj Lord publicly privately; He nie laska transgressors
Nie zhnity zem it set straight kult Him reverence hope Iste GOD's zlutovanie bol attainable by the righteous

He bol 1 kto sends zranit dobry omen zlutovanie z Jeho hands Once they zozbierat heavy clouds my drive them dead zem send nadol zavlazit therefrom produce it all laskavy z ovocie! My thus resurrect dead ze ona berie heed
Dobry zem readily produces its zasadit odist its Lord chvila zly zem ledva produces anything useful. My thus explain revelations ludia bol appreciative
